languages.text: When Pasqal uses plasma or melta weapons the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, he gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда Паскаль впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} использует плазменное или мельта-оружие, он восстанавливает 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When Pasqal uses plasma or melta weapons the first time in a round, he gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
When Pasqal uses plasma or melta weapons the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, he gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn Pasqal zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} Plasma- oder Melterwaffen einsetzt, erhält er +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: When Pasqal uses plasma or melta weapons the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, he gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jedes Mal, wenn Pasqal Plasma- oder Melterwaffen einsetzt, erhält er 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} zurück.
Wenn Pasqal zum ersten Mal in einer Runde Plasma- oder Melterwaffen einsetzt, erhält er +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} la première fois que Pasqal utilise des armes à plasma ou à fusion, il gagne +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: When Pasqal uses plasma or melta weapons the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, he gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} la première fois que Pasqal utilise des armes à plasma ou à fusion, il gagne +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: 当帕斯卡在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次使用等离子武器或热熔武器进行攻击时，恢复1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: When Pasqal uses plasma or melta weapons the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, he gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当帕斯卡使用等离子武器或热熔武器进行攻击时，都会恢复1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
当帕斯卡在一轮中首次使用等离子武器或热熔武器进行攻击时，恢复1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.original_text: Every time Pasqal uses plasma or melta weapons, he regains 1 AP.

languages.text: La primera vez que Pasqal use armas de plasma o de fusión en cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, recupera 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: When Pasqal uses plasma or melta weapons the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, he gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que Pasqal use armas de plasma o de fusión, recupera 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: Когда Паскаль впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} использует плазменное или мельта-оружие, он восстанавливает 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
languages.original_text: When Pasqal uses plasma or melta weapons the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, he gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Каждый раз при использовании плазменного или мельта-оружия Паскаль восстанавливает 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
Каждый раз при использовании плазменного или мельта-оружия Паскаль восстанавливает 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

languages.text: パスカルがプラズマまたはメルタウェポンを使用すると毎回1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を獲得する。
languages.original_text: Every time Pasqal uses plasma or melta weapons, he regains 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: パスカルがプラズマまたはメルタウェポンを使用すると毎回1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を獲得する。

languages.text: Pasqal bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez plazma veya melta silahı kullandığında +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text: When Pasqal uses plasma or melta weapons the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, he gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
